Text: Excellent quality download. Terrific book. Scary as hell. This book paints a picture that could easily be all too real and it isn't a pretty one. It's worse case scenario: the total breakdown of society. It gave me nightmares. Should be a must read for all Americans. I must say, though I was already kind of half-assed getting ready for the collapse, this has shifted me into a much higher gear.  This really should be a must read for everyone.
A really good book. I do like "Light's out a bit more though.
